feed.title: Computational and Mathematical Biophysics
feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in Computational and Mathematical Biophysics

entry.title: Mathematical model on influence of past experiences on present activities of human brain
entry.summary: Article by P. Raja Sekhara Rao, K. Venkata Ratnam, G. Shirisha DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/cmb-2025-0024

entry.title: Understanding biofilm--phage interactions in cystic fibrosis patients using mathematical frameworks

entry.title: Existence and uniqueness of solution for a fractional hepatitis B model

entry.title: Mathematical model of the impact of chemotherapy and antiangiogenic therapy on drug resistance in glioma growth
entry.summary: Article by Latifah Hanum, Nanang Susyanto, Dwi Ertiningsih DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/cmb-2025-0022

entry.title: Study of transmission pattern of COVID-19 among cardiac and noncardiac population using a nonlinear mathematical model
